education_history.degree: Bachelor of Computer Science (Software Engineering & AI)
bullets: Relevant Coursework: Data Structures & Algorithms, OOP, Software Engineering, Web Development (React, Flask), Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning
Built a Chrome extension utilizing dictionary API to automate word analysis and noun categorization, assisting over 50 admission processors.
Implemented real-time, color-coded feedback using JavaScript, analyzing definitions and parts of speech, improving accuracy and reducing processing time by 70%.

Boosted evaluation efficiency by building a metric-calculating tool, analyzing word count, sentence structure, readability scores, and vocabulary diversity, leading to a 30% improvement in decision-making.

Mentored 15+ students in the development and presentation of final projects and models.
